lead_paragraph: Sam Querrey said this year's Wimbledon had been a triumph for the United States after the nation's best showing at the championships for 12 years.
snippet: Sam Querrey said this year's Wimbledon had been a triumph for the United States after the nation's best showing at the championships for 12 years....

headline.main: Querrey Hails American Success at Wimbledon
headline.print_headline: Querrey Hails American Success at Wimbledon
